name: Ragnar Blomquist
obverse: Bust of Ragnar Blomquist facing right.
reverse: Inscription in 4 lines. Below is the symbol of Höganäs AB (an anchor with H B). Inscription around the edge of the medal.
reverse_inscriptions: KRAFT OCH FRAMSYNTHET PRÄGLADE HANS GÄRNING
description: Ragnar Blomquist was a Swedish engineer who was named the head of Höganäs AB (a metal powder manufacturer) in 1925.
